--- named_schemas_drop_table.sql
DROP TABLE sch1.ShoppingCarts
--- AST
&ast.DropTable{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 11,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 16,
        NameEnd: 29,
        Name:    "ShoppingCarts",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP TABLE sch1.ShoppingCarts
